Title: Minimalism rules
Content: This last fortnight has been a tremendously exciting one for shopaholics. Mumbai’s Palladium mall, home to Zara, Burberry and Jimmy Choo, has made room for international mammoths, Swedish high-street
Author: Pearl Shah
Description: This last fortnight has been a tremendously exciting one for shopaholics. Mumbai’s Palladium mall, home to Zara, Burberry and Jimmy Choo, has made room for international mammoths, Swedish high-street
